## SpliceStrategy variable

Functionality related to tracking changes in arrays.

**Signature:**

```typescript
SpliceStrategy: Readonly<{
    readonly reset: Splice[];
    readonly setDefaultStrategy: (strategy: SpliceStrategy) => void;
}>
```
